sense.def:
To safeguard something
pomeni preprečiti, da bi se tisto poškodovalo ali bilo prizadeto.

seg.quote: They have to fight to safeguard their future.

sense.def:
A safeguard
je zakon ali pravilo, katerega cilj je preprečiti, da bi se nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: This clause was inserted as a safeguard against possible exploitation.
